Speaker: Punctuality. Diligence. Effectiveness. On those we shall build a society we can be proud of.
The right to each household’s own phone must be earned.
Guards are being hired. The applicants’ as well as their close relatives’ backgrounds will be checked. For more information call 555-0110.
The police are your friends, the Tune terrorist is not. Report suspicious individuals to: 555-0101.
Reporting is good for society and every citizen should work to society’s benefit.
The curfew applies to all citizens without an outdoors license from 6 pm to 6 am.
Possessing singing birds is a crime.
Being unconscious will not lessen the crime. Report sleep singers immediately.
Rhymes are ugly, don’t be ugly.
